outcome: Mysterious malware corrupts citizen identity, leading to a crisis of invisibility.

events.description: Citizens suddenly lose access to critical services due to corrupted identity records, causing panic and confusion.
Public outcry escalates as more citizens realize their legal invisibility and inability to prove identities.
The Council convenes emergency sessions, acknowledging a severe crisis but failing to deliver immediate solutions.
Protests spread demanding immediate restoration of identities and compensation for lost services.
